headline: Expanded Insurance Coverage Validates Circle’s AI Approach to Coronary Plaque Evaluation
summary: Coverage unlocks reimbursable AI plaque quantification, advancing coronary risk assessment in everyday cardiology practiceHighlights New permanent Category I CPT code 75577 for AI-enabled coronary plaque analysis took effect January 1, 2026Major payers, including Aetna, alongside UnitedHealthcare, Cigna, Humana, and others, now cover AI-enabled coronary plaque analysis, extending access to tens of millions of commercially insured patientsCircle’s FDA-cleared, on-premise cvi42|Plaque solution int
